scripts.sim: pnpm build && cap sync ios && cd ios/App && xcodebuild -workspace App.xcworkspace -scheme App -configuration Debug -destination "id=E21426F6-B691-48B3-A620-9FCDDED0D9A3" -derivedDataPath ../DerivedData CODE_SIGNING_ALLOWED=NO CODE_SIGN_IDENTITY="" CODE_SIGNING_REQUIRED=NO -quiet && xcrun simctl boot E21426F6-B691-48B3-A620-9FCDDED0D9A3 2>/dev/null; xcrun simctl install E21426F6-B691-48B3-A620-9FCDDED0D9A3 ../DerivedData/Build/Products/Debug-iphonesimulator/App.app && xcrun simctl launch E21426F6-B691-48B3-A620-9FCDDED0D9A3 com.mrblu.app && open -a Simulator
scripts.build:ios: pnpm build:mobile && cd ios/App && fastlane build
scripts.build:android: pnpm build:mobile && cd android && fastlane build_release
scripts.deploy:ios:beta: pnpm build:mobile && cd ios/App && fastlane beta
scripts.deploy:ios:release: pnpm build:mobile && cd ios/App && fastlane release
scripts.deploy:android:internal: pnpm build:mobile && cd android && fastlane internal
scripts.deploy:android:beta: pnpm build:mobile && cd android && fastlane beta
scripts.deploy:android:release: pnpm build:mobile && cd android && fastlane release
